abstract: Someone has bid $700,100 to dine with the billionaire investor Warren E. Buffett in an annual charity auction, pushing the bidding at this point far ahead of last year’s level.
snippet: Someone has bid $700,100 to dine with the billionaire investor Warren E. Buffett in an annual charity auction, pushing the bidding at this point far ahead of last year’s level.
lead_paragraph: Someone has bid $700,100 to dine with the billionaire investor Warren E. Buffett in an annual charity auction, pushing the bidding at this point far ahead of last year’s level, Reuters reports.

headline.main: Warren Buffett’s Lunch Tab: $700,100 and Climbing
